post.body: Listening to Stand Up and loving my ride home from Santa Monica to Hollywood :)
see? I knew you were awesome... but I'm telling you, Figure 8 is the bees knees
and my wallet's too small for my $50s and my diamond shoes are too tight
ah yes, but I heard the acting is STILL terrible...
thanks Seth! I'll check out Sennheiser
hey... get back to WORK :P
actually it's pretty good... the m.twitter.com site looks great
let's make out
met and exceeded... now if you could make a killer BlackBerry Storm app -- I'll name my first born Splitweet
yes! let's do that -- hit me on my email: angela@musicismybf.com too bad muxtape is on hiatus
um, PHOTO required...
you're just awesome... too much?
ah... well I'm not sure, but I think the Storm might be waterproof and it might also be able to iron shirts
thank GOODness!! Cinco de Mayo was going to be a wash this year without this info. I'm on the phone with the party planner now..
is that sarcasm? we're going to get along JUST fine...
YES!!! this is wonderful. now you'll ALWAYS know when I'm having Luna : )
that was in Aug! I liked salsa dancing at Brazil's but we went for a bachelorette party without dudes, I don't recommend that
two new catch phrases in my office thanks to you: "uh oh...gotta go!" and "buh-bye poo poo"
yes I know, but I can't -- I have a work happy hour to go to at 6 in Culver City ... he's playing L.A. tomorrow
any idea where Patrick can work? http://tinyurl.com/6pqk3v
I got it mister man! The Greenest laptop ever made
I think I haven't gotten one because I didn't think I'd be able to use it, now -- I kinda wish I'd gotten one ages ago
see? this is the "look on the bright side" attitude that only infuriates me more... "I LOVE the rain!" gives me a motive
thanks!
that'a a philadelphia, meat-eating, xmas tradition I actually miss... now I'm a Los Angelino pescetarian in line for pinkberry
BYOE.... LOL
well I have no problem with Starbucks having food, as long as it's healthy, low-fat and compliments coffee and tea...
give it a little time, it's worth it -- trust me!
will you marry me? I'll email you my "list of musicians/famous dudes/tech geniuses" I can sleep with and it's not cheating
well if I get a Wii and you get on a plane, we'll have a world of wonderful technology and sexy
apple.com take my money, PLEASE
it's an elliott smith morning... Figure 8 and New Moon are floating to the top
Year Zero is a masterpiece.
neeeeeed foooooood
working hard at work while working.
needs some new headphones... any recommendations? anyone got an extra set they want to gift?
btw in case you were wondering oh internet of massiveness -- the Zion I mixtape is off the hook
testing Splitweet which I think is probably awesome... let's see
has bangs.
is watching Crank... Jason Statham is smokin!
has got you on my radar...on my radar... on my radar... on my radar
apparently, it's The Killers and MSTRKRFT remixes -- naturally
listening to HypeM radio... GREAT way to find out about great new remixes and what all the bloggers are listening to this moment!
http://tinyurl.com/5hzy4a
http://twitpic.com/qa32 - Ferocious Few at The Rumble now
high... school... picture day in L.A.
The new record by The Killers ain't so bad...especially that Spaceman song. I actually really like it!
Neon Tiger there's a lot on your mind
canNOT live on the Wilshire corridor... shEEsh
hearts Johnny Galecki
is watching The Big Bang Theory... yay DVR
also, while I'm at lunch, if anyone knows where I can get a ticket to the NIN show in Las Vegas this weekend, that'd be awesome...
lunch at Frida and MAYBE if I'm a good girl, I'll come back with a CD that isn't out in the states yet
is at work working on work before going to lunch to do sort of work but that other place to work on more work isn't going to work today.
is at work working on work before going to lunch do sort of work but that other place to work on more work isn't going to work today.
is at work working on work before going to another place to work on more work at working.
going to see a friend's band tonight, then Vegas tomorrow!
is staying at Planet Hollywood, where the show is, tomorrow night! SOOOO excited!
cannot STAND when customer service people use the words: "unfortunately", "brief hold", "actually" it's SO impersonal
wishing someone would get me a Philips SWAROVSKI ACTIVE CRYSTALS HEART WARE FM01SW20 rather than chocolates for a present this year...
http://twitpic.com/s20s - Bike in the Back
my friend Patrick needs a job: CAREER SERVER IN MANHATTAN http://tinyurl.com/6pqk3v
loves that she just booked a ticket to Vegas and it's only going to take an hour to get there... AND THEN she'll get to see her HERO!
wants to live in West Hollywood, please help her find a place to live! I need to live on or around Santa Monica Blvd and no roommates plz
Los Angeles, when I married you I thought we agreed we didn't want rain... How could this happen?
this is the best thing ever: http://tinyurl.com/5ctyqm now I'll click on the stuff you people post, I swear.
do you homemade guacamole take thee baked potato to be united in this plate for my enjoyment? "I do" I now pronounce you lunch!
http://www.musicismybf.com new updates, a new post or two and a promise to all of you
so apparently Adele is the new Feist http://www.notherground.com/audio/Adele1988MickBoogie.zip
is looking for an apt in WeHo for around/under $1K -- nothing too fancy, just a studio is fine and maybe furnished would be great!
is looking for somewhere fun, wintery and dog-friendly to bring her friends over the xmas holiday.
just bought a signed, numbered print by someone whose work I admire a great deal... happy holidays me!
just thought of what I want for Christmas more than anything: a passport
setting up my MobileMe: angelapoe that's me! add me!
*sigh* alll right : ) but don't go thinking all it has to do is not rain and I'll be smiling, those don't come without a price you know...
if we can agree that the rain is OVER, I'll put on a happy face. one drop and it's right back to psycho killer
*hands the gun over to @jamiefishback" (but hides the machete behind her back...
just got her new Mac... she's a LITTLE happier (still raining tho, dammit)
considers rain in Los Angeles a PERSONAL affront to her happiness
Ace of Base, The Beatles, Cake, Damien Rice, Eiffel 65 go iPod go!
is on the 15 on the way back from Vegas
watching Adventures in Babysitting and couldn't be happier!
bored, annoyed and confused, thank you art-house bozos
has heard, "you can kill someone with kindness too..."
just saw The Spirit... not sure if she liked the story yet, but the look of it was wonderful!
is looking for a studio apt in West Hollywood for under $1100... d message me if you have any suggestions!
Mythbusters effing rules my face off...
I hope everyone is having a happy holiday week! xo
Watching The Curious Case of Benjamin Buttons in Karen's living room... I would like to thank The Academy
http://tinyurl.com/a3us3m
is listening to Francis Dunnery
happy winter break everyone! After noon today I will be off til the 5th -- message me if you're in L.A.!
wants to make it wit chu Josh Homme
updated her Netflix queue
